channel.title: My own client help
channel.description:
ok my client was working fine yesterday and now every time i run a server i get this
[code] Exception in thread "AWT-EventQueue-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method8(client.java:4760) at Applet_Sub1.method3(Applet_Sub1.java:146) at Applet_Sub1.destroy(Applet_Sub1.java:198) at Applet_Sub1.windowClosing(Applet_Sub1.java:431) at java.awt.Window.processWindowEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Window.processEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Component.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Container.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Window.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Component.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForFilters(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForFilter(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForHierarchy(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]

item.title: My own client help
item.dc:creator: @spankjava spank
item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

ok my client was working fine yesterday and now every time i run a server i get this

Exception in thread "AWT-EventQueue-0" java.lang.NullPointerException
        at client.method8(client.java:4760)
        at Applet_Sub1.method3(Applet_Sub1.java:146)
        at Applet_Sub1.destroy(Applet_Sub1.java:198)
        at Applet_Sub1.windowClosing(Applet_Sub1.java:431)
        at java.awt.Window.processWindowEvent(Unknown Source)
        at java.awt.Window.processEvent(Unknown Source)
        at java.awt.Component.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source)
        at java.awt.Container.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source)
        at java.awt.Window.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source)
        at java.awt.Component.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source)
        at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source)
        at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForFilters(Unknown Source)
        at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForFilter(Unknown Source)
        at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForHierarchy(Unknown Source)
        at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source)
        at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source)
        at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(Unknown Source)
